forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming less numerous during the afternoon hours. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Slight chance of a shower late. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Slight chance of a shower late. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with occasional rain in the morning...then a few showers late. High 14C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with a steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 11C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 52F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 49F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 18C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 64F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 18C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High near 65F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
